description: Teacher grading application with student management, assignment grading, auto-grading from answer keys, grade calculations, and report export

userStories.title: Project setup and basic Streamlit app
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the basic project structure so I can build the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Create requirements.txt with streamlit, pandas, openpyxl dependencies
Create app.py with basic Streamlit multipage app structure
Create CLAUDE.md with project conventions
App runs with 'streamlit run app.py'
userStories.notes: Completed: Created requirements.txt, app.py with multipage structure, directory structure

userStories.title: SQLite database setup for students and classes
userStories.description: As a teacher, I need persistent storage for my students and classes.
acceptanceCriteria: Create database module with SQLite connection
Create tables: classes (id, name), students (id, name, class_id)
Include helper functions for CRUD operations
Database file stored in data/grader.db
userStories.notes: Completed: Created modules/database.py with all CRUD operations

userStories.title: Class management page
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to create and manage my classes.
acceptanceCriteria: Page to view all classes in a table
Form to add new class
Button to delete class (with confirmation)
Classes persist in database
userStories.notes: Completed: Created modules/pages/classes.py with full CRUD UI

userStories.title: Student roster management
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to add and manage students in each class.
acceptanceCriteria: Select class from dropdown to view students
Table showing all students in selected class
Form to add new student to class
Edit and delete student functionality
Bulk import students from CSV
userStories.notes: Completed: Created modules/pages/students.py with all features including CSV import

userStories.title: Assignment database schema
userStories.description: As a teacher, I need to store assignments and grades.
acceptanceCriteria: Create assignments table (id, name, class_id, max_points, weight, due_date)
Create grades table (id, student_id, assignment_id, points, comments)
Create answer_keys table (id, assignment_id, question_num, correct_answer, points)
Helper functions for assignment CRUD

userStories.title: Assignment management page
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to create assignments for my classes.
acceptanceCriteria: Select class to view/create assignments
Form to create assignment (name, max points, weight, due date)
List of assignments for selected class
Edit and delete assignment functionality

userStories.title: Manual grade entry
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to manually enter grades for assignments.
acceptanceCriteria: Select class and assignment
Show all students with input fields for points and comments
Save grades to database
Show existing grades when editing

userStories.title: Answer key creation
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to create answer keys for auto-grading.
acceptanceCriteria: Select assignment to create/edit answer key
Add questions with correct answers and point values
Support multiple choice (A,B,C,D) and short text answers
Save answer key to database

userStories.title: Auto-grading from student responses
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to auto-grade assignments using my answer key.
acceptanceCriteria: Upload CSV/Excel with student responses (columns: student_name, q1, q2, ...)
Match responses against answer key
Calculate scores automatically
Show grading results with breakdown per question
Option to save grades to database

userStories.title: Grade calculations and gradebook view
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to see calculated grades for all students.
acceptanceCriteria: Gradebook page showing all students and their grades
Calculate weighted average based on assignment weights
Show letter grade (A/B/C/D/F) based on configurable scale
Highlight missing assignments

userStories.title: Grade scale configuration
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to configure my grading scale.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings page for grade scale (A >= 90, B >= 80, etc.)
Save scale to database
Use configured scale in grade calculations

userStories.title: Export reports to CSV/Excel
userStories.description: As a teacher, I want to export grades for record keeping.
acceptanceCriteria: Export gradebook to Excel with all students and assignments
Export individual student report
Export class summary with statistics
Download button for each export
